definition: anger produced by some annoying irritation, to warm by rubbing, as with the hands
details:
noun
- anger produced by some annoying irritation
= synonyms: annoyance
- soreness and warmth caused by friction
= example: soreness and warmth caused by friction
verb
- to warm by rubbing, as with the hands
- to cause friction
= example: to cause friction
= synonyms: rub
- to tear or wear off the skin or make sore by abrading
= example: to tear or wear off the skin or make sore by abrading
= synonyms: excoriate
- to cause annoyance in
= synonyms: rag
- to feel extreme irritation or anger
- to become or make sore by or as if by rubbing
= example: to become or make sore by or as if by rubbing
= synonyms: fret
